etymons.meaning: nachdenken, nachsinnen, sich Gedanken machen, Erwägungen anstellen; denken

Imperativ.turoyo: əmmoya u=malk-ayḏi i=aṯt-ayḏuxtə=medelayba i=aṯt-ayḏux i=barṯ-ayḏi-yo i=barṯo d-u=malko d-i=flānḥa-yo d-u=hno-yolaytebatə=medeomər lo=k-owe mətfakarkibamede i=aṯt-ayḏikibaṭabiʕa lay-yoṭawto
translations: ‘She (the king’s mother-in-law) said: “My king, your wife has nothing (bad). Your wife is my daughter, daughter of the king so-and-so, and there is nothing (bad) in her”. He said: “It won’t do! Think (better)! There is something in the nature of my wife that is not good” 81/93-94;
